title: Approval of Trump's immigration policies tumbles in new poll
shortDescription: In an NBC News survey taken the week after Alex Pretti's death in Minneapolis, Americans appear to sour on Trump and immigration enforcement tactics.

title: This rep's decision has big implications for control of Congress
shortDescription: Florida Republican Neal Dunn's potential early resignation could further shrink the GOP's already thin U.S. House majority.

title: Former President Barack Obama's journey to the White House
shortDescription: Barack Obama was the 44th president of the United States from 2009 to 2017. Take a look at his life in photos.

title: Trump reaffirms he's excluding two Democratic governors from meeting
shortDescription: President Trump rejected claims from the National Governors Association that he agreed to open up a White House meeting to all governors.

title: 'You all should be apologizing.' Bondi fights with Democrats in fiery hearing
shortDescription: Grilled on Capitol Hill over the Epstein files, the attorney general urged lawmakers to shift their attention to the stock market and crime.

title: DOJ Epstein files release looms large as Pam Bondi faces Congress
shortDescription: Pam Bondi faces Congress amid concerns over Trump administration's handling of release of files related to disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Watch live: Pam Bondi questioned over Epstein files in Congress
shortDescription: The U.S. attorney general is expected to answer questions about the latest Epstein files drop.

title: Trump pushes SAVE Act voter ID bill
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is advocating for the passage of the SAVE America Act, a voter ID bill critics say could make voting harder for married women and other eligible voters.

title: Grand jury blocks DOJ case against Democrats
shortDescription: A grand jury blocks DOJ case against six Democrats over a controversial video message to service members.

title: Bondi grilled by Dems accusing DOJ of Jeffrey Epstein cover-up: Recap
shortDescription: Bondi calls lawmaker a 'washed up loser lawyer' as she and Democrats in Congress spar over whether DOJ covered up bombshell Jeffrey Epstein allegations.

title: Grand jury rejects DOJ attempt to indict 6 Democrats in Congress
shortDescription: A grand jury rejected charges sought by the Department of Justice against six Democratic lawmakers who appeared in a video that told service members they had a right to refuse illegal orders

title: Governors to skip Trump meeting after White House excluded Democrats
shortDescription: The White House meeting, which was scheduled for February 20, was slated to be part of the National Governors Association's annual winter gathering.

title: GOP rep wants probe of Bad Bunny Super Bowl halftime show: 'Pure smut'
shortDescription: A GOP congressman has requested an investigation of Bad Bunny's history-making Super Bowl LX halftime performance, claiming it was "pure smut."

title: Congress plans to bury a time capsule. Should a rock album go inside?
shortDescription: Members of Congress are already joking about burying rivals and rock albums. But will they be able to agree on what to put in a time capsule?

title: Trump to repeal greenhouse gas finding in major deregulatory rollback
shortDescription: The Trump administration is rescinding an Obama-era scientific finding that has served as the legal basis for regulations targeting greenhouse gases.

title: Is there a sales tax increase for LA County? Here's what to know
shortDescription: Here's everything to know about the proposal, and what it'll cost residents.

title: Proposal would raise county sales tax for five years to 2031
shortDescription: The Los Angeles County Board of Supervisors is considering a half cent sales tax increase following significant federal funding cuts.
